name: adonis-experiment

scripts.start: echo "\033[31mWARN: 'start' will be depreciated soon. Instead use 'npm run serve'" && npm run serve
scripts.dev: echo "\033[31mWARN: 'dev' will be depreciated soon. Instead use 'npm run serve:dev'" && npm run serve:dev
scripts.serve:dev: nodemon --watch app --watch bootstrap --watch config --watch .env -x node server.js -L

author: Hastegan
description: Vagrant is a tool for building and managing virtual machine environments in a single workflow. If you do not wish to use Vagrant, jump to **Project**.
